projects.title: Project Mangament
projects.description: The most known type of application which is project management and bug tracker. I've built the application using ASP.NET core as the backend and bootstrap as frontend. Application handles managing of project status and tracks the issues related to the project.

projects.title: Music Files Manager
projects.description: Personal project for managing my files.The application uses TagLib library to extract the metadata of the audio files and sorts the audio files by artist and then albums.

projects.title: Mailer
projects.description: Personal project for sending same email to multiple recipients.The application uses XAML for UI and C# as code behind.The application uses MimeKit to compose the email and MailKit to send the email.
